sayings.19: Better to be busy than to be busy worrying

info.title: Hope and Good News
info.hgn-1: First US clinical human trial of potential coronavirus vaccine set to start Monday [March 16, 2020]
info.hgn-2: A second potential COVID-19 vaccine, backed by Bill and Melinda Gates, is entering human testing. [April 6, 2020]
info.hgn-3: German company Bosch produces 95% accurate test with testing time under 2.5 hours and no laboratory required.
info.hi-1: Information by the Government and the Ministry of Health in Ecuador.
info.hi-3: We help companies to connect with their desktop computer from their offices for remote work in Ecuador [VPN]. Write us...
